channel.title: CVE Feed for F-Secure and WithSecure -- All F-Secure and WithSecure Endpoint Protection products for Windows and Mac running 32 bit operating system. F-Secure Linux Security 32 F-Secure Atlant F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper WithSecure Cloud Protection for Salesforce WithSecure Collaboration Protection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F-Secure and WithSecure -- All F-Secure and WithSecure Endpoint Protection products for Windows and Mac running 32 bit operating system. F-Secure Linux Security 32 F-Secure Atlant F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper WithSecure Cloud Protection for Salesforce WithSecure Collaboration Protection

item.description: A Denial-of-Service vulnerability was discovered in the F-Secure and WithSecure products where aerdl.dll may go into an infinite loop when unpacking PE files. It is possible that this can crash the scanning engine.
